title: A Best of Fence, The First Nine Years, Volume I
description: A historical document so significant it requires two volumes. FENCE evades tedium with this anthology, co-edited by editors past and present. In addition to presenting a compendium of poetry, criticism, and creative nonfiction, this volume includes editorsâ€™ reflective essays, and serves as an indispensable record of the inception & continuation of the most influential literary journal of its time.?
author: Rebecca Wolff
